channel.title: Changing chat color above players [718]?
channel.description:
Hello, could anyone help me out with changing the color chat above players forio [b]718 revison[/b]. I've tried trial and error areadly, just didn't work. I possibly think its client sided, or server sided. From sided i think it could be WorldPacketsDecoder and the [b]'CHAT_PACKET'[/b]. Thank you :D
Thank you for reading and stopping by at this post. If you need anything else just ask upon request. :)
